prod_desc: Battle with Batman™ against The Riddler™ and his allies!
prod_long_desc:
Take on four Super-Villains at once in THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE: The Riddler™ Riddle Racer set, featuring the Riddle Racer vehicle with two hidden flip-up spring-loaded shooters. Team up with Batman™ to defeat The Riddler™, Kite Man™, Magpie™ and Calendar Man™. Also includes Kite Man’s detachable glider pack with posable wings, Batman’s Batarang, Magpie’s dynamite elements and other role-play-inspiring weapons and accessory elements. Includes five minifigures.
Build The Riddler’s custom race car with flip-up spring-loaded shooters and secret blasters!
Featured in THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE
Includes Batman, The Riddler, Magpie, Calendar Man and Kite Man with buildable kite-pack
THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Riddle Racer is over 1” high, 7” long and 2” wide. Kite Man’s kite is over 3” wide
254 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14 years old
